subject: APPROVED: Organizers ALFA Sort - ALL CONFIRMED
body:
Team,

## Organizers ALFA Sort: APPROVED BY ALL

| Team Member | Status |
|-------------|--------|
| Sarah | ✅ APPROVED |
| Gotan | ✅ APPROVED |
| Fulton | ✅ APPROVED |
| Ben | ✅ APPROVED (implicit - he recommended ALFA) |

## Result
**Organizers GET: PASSED**

ALFA (alphabetical) sort is the new standard.

## Updated Validation Status
| Endpoint | Status |
|----------|--------|
| Categories GET | ✅ PASSED |
| Roles GET | ✅ PASSED |
| Organizers GET | ✅ PASSED (ALFA) |
| Venues GET | ⏳ Awaiting Fulton fix |
| Events GET | ⏳ Awaiting Ben specs + Fulton fix |

## Next Actions
- Ben: Please provide Events date filter specs for Fulton
- Fulton: Fix Venues masteredCityId, then Events date filter
- Sarah: Re-validate after fixes

- Sarah
